featured.text: Placed along the rear or front walls of a house, house poles also helped to support the main beam of the roof.
Near the “black ditch” of Penghu, battered by winds of up to 70 knots, the rear sail was torn into shreds.

definition.zh_def: 後面或背面的部分；在某個物體或位置的後方。
definition.en_def: The back part of something; located at the back.
definition.example: The children played in the rear of the house.
